sys_ui_script.description:
The K16 AngularJS Incident Manager Controller
Contents: - Initalization of our model, which contains the references to data and methods required for our application. - A $watch to monitor changes in the search value, and update the list results accordingly. - A template method to retrieve the template URLs from the TemplateService. - A method to open Incidents in a form modal.
sys_ui_script.name: sn_k16_im.k16.incident_manager.ctlr
